title: Chocolate coffee cupcakes
ingredients: ['150g soft brown sugar', '150g unsalted butter, softened', '3 medium eggs', '150g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 tablespoon chocolate flavouring (best is Monin® chocolate cookie syrup)', '2 tablespoons instant coffee powder (Kenco® Millicano is the best)', '1 small bag white chocolate chips']
